Staff of Elemental Mastery

two handed weapon (lvl 6)

item id [id]: 90
magic bonus [boosters]: +FAWE
resist fire [fireres]: +5
resist cold [coldres]: +5
fire ritual range bonus [firerange]: +1
air ritual range bonus [airrange]: +1
water ritual range bonus [waterrange]: +1
earth ritual range bonus [earthrange]: +1
weap id [weapon]: 238 (Magic Staff)
damage [dmg]: 3
attack [att]: +2
defence [def]: +4
length [len]: 3
nbr of attacks [nratt]: 1
 
(Requires Two Hands [twohanded], Bludgeoning Damage [blunt], Magic weapon [magic])

Requires 25F25W to forge (F4W4)

A mage who wields this staff will enjoy increased power in all Elemental paths of magic (Fire, Air, Water and Earth), and can cast Elemental rituals at a greater range. The staff also provides partial protection against the two Elements used in its forging.
